issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I am trying to build an Android module that includes .aar files. The module currently doesn't do much at all but when I include various .aar files then the module is created but when it gets to running the test app of the module it fails. 

It creates the unsigned apk and then processes the dex files and then the src files when it throws the following error. 

(__('Valid ABIs for this project: %s', this.abis(', '))); 
: this.abis is not a function 
Failed to run ti /Users/jasonwogan/.appcelerator/install/7.0.3/package/node_modules/titanium/lib/titanium.js 


The Module: https://github.com/jwogan5/sampleApp/blob/master/android.zip 

*Steps To Reproduce*
1. Just build that module
2. Then run it with any sample test App.
fields.summary: App does not run if included module have multiple .aar file.
fields.environment:
Operating System
  Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.13.4
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 8.8.0
  npm Version                 = 5.4.2
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.1.0
Titanium SDK
  SDK Version                 = 7.1.1.GA
  SDK Path                    = /Users/user/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/7.1.1.GA
  Target Platform             = android

comments.body: This ticket should be in TIMOB, not MOD. MOD is solely for module we produce
